import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Redirect} from "react-router-dom"; class Contact extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { isRedirect: false, fillCountry:"Vietnam" } } //Dispose a form submitForm = (event) => { event.preventDefault() this.setState({ isRedirect: true }) } //Luu thong tin nhap vao, vao 1 mang isChange = (event) => { const names = event.target.name const values = event.target.value this.setState({ [names]: values }); } getValues = () => { var content ="" content += "The Nam is: " + this.state.fillName content += " / The Email is: " + this.state.fillEmail content += " / The Phone is: " + this.state.fillPhone content += " / The Mess is: " + this.state.fillMess content += " / The Country is: " + this.state.fillCountry return content } render() { //bam submit dieu huong ve "/" if(this.state.isRedirect) { console.log(this.getValues()) return } return (

Contact me

{/*End header*/} {/*Begin contact*/}
{/* Contact Section Heading */}

Input your information

{/* Icon Divider */}
{/* Contact Section Form */}
{/* To configure the contact form email address, go to mail/contact_me.php and update the email address in the PHP file on line 19. */}
this.isChange(event)} name="fillName"className="form-control" id="name" type="text" placeholder="Name" required="required" data-validation-required-message="Please enter your name." />

this.isChange(event)} name ="fillEmail" className="form-control" id="email" type="email" placeholder="Email Address" required="required" data-validation-required-message="Please enter your email address." />

this.isChange(event)} name="fillNumber"className="form-control" id="phone" type="tel" placeholder="Phone Number" required="required" data-validation-required-message="Please enter your phone number." />


this.isChange(event)} type="file" className="form-control-file" name="fillFile" />
